Name: Divinity II: Ego Draconis
Overview: The action-RPG sequel to the critically acclaimed Divine Divinity, Divinity II - Ego Draconis transports players back to the wide-open world of Rivellon, where they'll face the ultimate challenge of becoming a Dragon Knight. With up to 60 hours of gameplay, and the ability to play as either a knight or a dragon, Divinity II offers players an expansive experience rife with lands to explore, dungeons to conquer and plenty of on-the-ground and aerial combat.
